section.div: Favorites genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Adventure, Romance, Fantasy

div.div:
Enter: a bunch of cool guys who look like they got that unapproachable swag. But let's be realâ€”that's not the true them. They're just a bunch of dorks who've got the act down pat. So sit back, grab some popcorn and enjoy watching a bunch of goofy guys try to look cool all day every day.
(Source: Yen Press)
Action, Comedy, Psychological, Slice of Life, Supernatural
The third season of Mob Psycho 100. The appearance of a divine tree and new religion turns Mob and Reigen's city upside down! (Source: Crunchyroll)
